channel.title: Your Podcast Player
channel.itunes:author: The Wix Podcast Team
channel.itunes:summary: All the info, audio or video that’s needed to show and play your podcast episodes is contained in the RSS feed. Head to Settings and connect your podcast’s RSS feed.
channel.description: All the info, audio or video that’s needed to show and play your podcast episodes is contained in the RSS feed. Head to Settings and connect your podcast’s RSS feed.

item.title: Customizing Your Player
item.itunes:summary: Customize the look and feel of the player to match your site. Your podcast will look and sound awesome!
item.description: Customize the look and feel of the player to match your site. Your podcast will look and sound awesome!
item.itunes:author: The Wix Podcast Team

item.title: Designing Episode Pages
item.itunes:summary: Every episode automatically gets its own page. Visitors can watch, listen and download each episode.
item.description: Every episode automatically gets its own page. Visitors can watch, listen and download each episode.
item.itunes:author: The Wix Podcast Team

item.title: Updating Your Podcast
item.itunes:summary: Any changes you make to your podcast, like adding or editing an episode, will automatically be updated on your player.
item.description: Any changes you make to your podcast, like adding or editing an episode, will automatically be updated on your player.
item.itunes:author: The Wix Podcast Team

item.title: Podcasting Audio & Video
item.itunes:summary: Do you have video episodes in your podcast? Any podcast episodes will get a video player.
item.description: Do you have video episodes in your podcast? Any podcast episodes will get a video player.
item.itunes:author: The Wix Podcast Team
